bibl.title: The Taposiris Magna Mosaic in the Museum of Palestrina.
Egyptian Museum Collections around the World. Studies for the Centennial of the Egyptian Museum, Cairo. Volume II
bibl.author: VÖRÖS, Gyözö

bibl.note: The mosaic of Palestrina depicts Taposiris Magna and its surrounding from the vantage point of the top of the Pharos in Alexandria.
VÖRÖS Gyözö, The Taposiris Magna Mosaic in the Museum of Palestrina.
Mamdouh ELDAMATY and Mai TRAD (Edd.), Egyptian Museum Collections around the World. Studies for the Centennial of the Egyptian Museum, Cairo. Volume II (Cairo, 2002) pp. 1209-1220, 4 figg.
